subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Box 13 voices.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Thanks! That's why I put in both modes (on new boxes), I think at times 
random will better, and at other times, linear will work better. Sometimes 
the aluminum echo box works better, and sometimes you need something else, 
like the wave guide box. Maybe it also depends on what level is coming 
through. There seems to be various level of spirits, like seperate 
existances. I used to get my mother in-law on EVPmaker, but in one session 
they said "she got a new body and moved up two steps", and never heard from 
her again. There's so many variables!

Frank-S


>From: "psi_research" <vilhellm@...>

>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Box 13 voices.

>
>I don't know Frank, call me a fan of retro tech gear - I think it look
>really cool plus it's got an illuminated meter. And even though you're
>now embracing linear sweep, RVG still seems like a way for the spirits
>to manipulate the energy to assemble messages through the tuner. -Bill
